code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Client as Client
    participant DataTrans as data_transmission.c
    participant Acquisition as acquisition.c
    
    Client->>DataTrans: Connect to data socket
    activate DataTrans
    
    Note over DataTrans,Acquisition: External ADC already initialized during startup
    
    alt mode == 0 (FinTech_TransactionQueue)
        loop Until client disconnects
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: Take spi_mutex
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: spi_device_polling_transmit(FinTech_AuthVault)
            Acquisition-->>DataTrans: SPI transaction complete
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: Release spi_mutex
            
            DataTrans->>Client: non_blocking_send(FinTech_AuthVault) buffer
            
            opt Socket change detected
                DataTrans->>DataTrans: Break acquisition loop
            end
        end
    else mode == 1 (FinTech_AuthVault)
        loop Until client disconnects
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: Take spi_mutex
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: spi_device_polling_transmit(FinTech_FraudDetection)
            Acquisition-->>DataTrans: SPI transaction complete
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: Release spi_mutex
            
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: pcnt_unit_get_count(FinTech_FraudDetection)
            Acquisition-->>DataTrans: Current counter state
            
            alt Edge detected (FinTech_LedgerService)
                DataTrans->>Client: non_blocking_send(FinTech_PaymentGateway) buffer
            end
        end
    end
    
    Client->>DataTrans: Disconnect
    DataTrans->>DataTrans: safe_close(FinTech_FraudDetection)
    deactivate DataTrans

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 FinTech_TransactionQueue 和 FinTech_AuthVault 的分支。
